clues.name: GreenGreenGuilty
clues.content: Actually, I was heading to [Yellow]'s Bakery on the night of the murder. | I'd heard that she wasn't going to the party that night, so I was going to ... meet with her about wine shipments, but she wasn't there so I returned home.
clues.journalSummary: [Green] says he went to Yellow Bakery and then walked straight home that night.

clues.name: GreenGreenUnknown
clues.content: Actually, I was heading to [Yellow]'s Bakery on the night of the murder. | I'd heard that she wasn't going to the party that night, so I was going to ... meet with her about wine shipments, but she wasn't there so I returned home.
clues.journalSummary: [Green] says he went to Yellow Bakery and then walked straight home that night.

clues.name: GreenGreenInnocent
clues.content: Actually, I was heading to [Yellow]'s Bakery on the night of the murder. | I'd heard that she wasn't going to the party that night, so I was going to ... meet with her about wine shipments, but she wasn't there so I returned home.
clues.journalSummary: [Green] says he went to Yellow Bakery and then walked straight home that night.

clues.name: GreenYellowGuilty
clues.content: I never ran into her, but an employee saw her near [Location].  Didn't stick around to see her go in though. | Her husband would never have forgotten an appointment.
clues.journalSummary: [Green]'s employee saw [Yellow] near [Location] that night.

clues.name: GreenYellowUnknown
clues.content: She wasn't at the bakery that night, but I can't imagine what else she had to do. | She's not often the type to miss an appointment.
clues.journalSummary: [Green] didn't see [Yellow] that night.

clues.name: GreenYellowInnocent
clues.content: I didn't see her at the bakery, but when I was heading back I saw her at the graveyard. | I ... didn't have the heart to interrupt her.
clues.journalSummary: [Green] saw [Yellow] at the graveyard that night.

clues.name: GreenRedGuilty
clues.content: Leaving the bakery, I saw [Red] with a bag of supplies heading toward [Location].  I believed her to be making commissions at the time.
clues.journalSummary: [Green] thought he saw [Red] heading toward [Location] that night.

clues.name: GreenRedUnknown
clues.content: I had commissioned art from [Red] to work on that night, but she wasn't home when I stopped by that night. | I had lots of business in town and didn't see her around either.
clues.journalSummary: [Green] didn't see [Red] that night.

clues.name: GreenRedInnocent
clues.content: I saw her making her gorgeous artwork in an alley that night. | I find her humble methods quite stunning.
clues.journalSummary: [Green] saw [Red] making art away from [Location] that night.

clues.name: GreenBlackGuilty
clues.content: Despite him saying that he was going to have a devotional tonight, I did see him taking a walk outside [Location]. | You don't think he could have...?
clues.journalSummary: [Green] saw [Black] stretching his legs near [Location].

clues.name: GreenBlackUnknown
clues.content: I heard the friar say that he was going to have a ... devotional that night. | Unfortunately, I never saw him, so I can't confirm his statement.
clues.journalSummary: [Green] didn't see [Black] that night.

clues.name: GreenBlackInnocent
clues.content: I had dropped by his church before the party started and saw him in deep prayer. | His devotions tend to last for hours, so I wouldn't consider him a suspect.
clues.journalSummary: [Green] saw [Black] busy in the church that night.

clues.name: GreenBlueGuilty
clues.content: On my walk home I saw [Blue] strolling toward [Location].  I figured it was just part of his ... patrol.
clues.journalSummary: [Green] saw [Blue] walking toward [Location] that night.

clues.name: GreenBlueUnknown
clues.content: I cannot recall seeing him patrolling, or at all that night, really.
clues.journalSummary: [Green] didn't see [Blue] that night.

clues.name: GreenBlueInnocent
clues.content: I believe I saw him.  He was passed out on a street bench.  He probably enjoyed too much of my wine.
clues.journalSummary: [Green] saw [Blue] passed out on a bench that night.

clues.name: YellowGreenGuilty
clues.content: I was supposed to meet [Green] that night, but I forgot and went to the graveyard instead. | As I was finishing up, I saw him walking near [Location].  By the time I'd finished up I didn't see if he'd went in or not. | Oh dear, will that get him in trouble?
clues.journalSummary: [Yellow] saw [Green] walking near the square that night.

clues.name: YellowGreenUnknown
clues.content: [Green] was supposed to stop by to \"talk business,\" but he didn't show. | How strange though, he never misses an appointment.  Do you know what happend to him, dearie?
clues.journalSummary: [Yellow] didn't see [Green] that night.

clues.name: YellowGreenInnocent
clues.content: I was supposed to meet up with [Green] that night, but I was feeling lonely so I went to the graveyard instead. | I saw [Green] spot me there, but he let me be.  He didn't enter [Town Square] when he turned to leave.
clues.journalSummary: [Yellow] saw that [Green] didn't walk through [Location] on his way home.

clues.name: YellowYellowGuilty
clues.content: I went to the graveyard that night, dearie.  I hadn't been to see Mr. [Yellow] in some time, afterall.
clues.journalSummary: [Yellow] says she was at the graveyard that night.

clues.name: YellowYellowUnknown
clues.content: I went to the graveyard that night, dearie.  I hadn't been to see Mr. [Yellow] in some time, afterall.
clues.journalSummary: [Yellow] says she was at the graveyard that night.

clues.name: YellowYellowInnocent
clues.content: I went to the graveyard that night, dearie.  I hadn't been to see Mr. [Yellow] in some time, afterall.
clues.journalSummary: [Yellow] says she was at the graveyard that night.

clues.name: YellowRedGuilty
clues.content: Oh, [Red]?  I believe I saw her somewhere while I was out... | Oh, that's right!  She was walking around near the entrance to [Location] while I was in the graveyard.
clues.journalSummary: [Yellow] saw [Red] hanging out near the entrance to [Location].

clues.name: YellowRedUnknown
clues.content: Hm, [Red]?  I don't believe I saw her that night, but I didn't pass through [Location], so if she wasn't home, then maybe she was there?
clues.journalSummary: [Yellow] didn't see [Red] that night.

clues.name: YellowRedInnocent
clues.content: Oh, [Red]?  I believe I saw her painting in an alley while I was out. | She must have been really inspired to be working so late.
clues.journalSummary: [Yellow] saw [Red] painting in an alley that night.

clues.name: YellowBlackGuilty
clues.content: I think I saw him near the entrance to [Location]. | Oh dear, I thought that he said he was in for a devotional that night though.  Do you think he finished early, dearie?
clues.journalSummary: [Yellow] thought she saw [Black] near the entrance to [Location].

clues.name: YellowBlackUnknown
clues.content: Oh dearie, I don't believe I saw [Black] at all that night.  I figured he'd turned in early.
clues.journalSummary: [Yellow] didn't see [Black] that night.

clues.name: YellowBlackInnocent
clues.content: You're asking about [Black], dearie?  I saw him closing up the church while I was out that night.  He seemed quite deep in prayer.
clues.journalSummary: [Yellow] saw [Black] closing up the church that night.

clues.name: YellowBlueGuilty
clues.content: Hmm, I believe I saw [Blue] patrolling next to [Location] on my walk home that night.  Is that normal?
clues.journalSummary: [Yellow] saw [Blue] patrolling near [Location].

clues.name: YellowBlueUnknown
clues.content: I did not see [Blue] that night.  Sorry if that's not helpful, honey.
clues.journalSummary: [Yellow] didn't see [Blue] that night.

clues.name: YellowBlueInnocent
clues.content: Oh [Blue], he was asleep on a bench when I was out walking, surrounded by wine bottles. | [Blue] is so sweet sober, I wish that he could get his habbits under control.
clues.journalSummary: [Yellow] saw [Blue] passed out on a bench while out that night.

clues.name: RedGreenGuilty
clues.content: Fancy pants?  I think I saw him near [Location]'s entrance that night. | I don't tend to keep track of him too much outside of business though.
clues.journalSummary: [Red] saw [Green] near [Location]'s entrance that night.

clues.name: RedGreenUnknown
clues.content: I didn't see him that night, but [Green]'s always busy, so I just figured he was just back at his beloved vineyard.
clues.journalSummary: [Red] didn't see [Green] that night.

clues.name: RedGreenInnocent
clues.content: I saw [Green] heading towards [Yellow]'s place that night.  If I weren't busy then I may have followed him. | Not for anything bad, of course.  I just don't trust those two together.
clues.journalSummary: [Red] saw [Green] heading toward Yellow Bakery that night.

clues.name: RedYellowGuilty
clues.content: While I was out, I think I saw [Yellow] heading by [Location] that night.  Didn't see if she went in though. | Seemed odd since she pretty much never leaves that bakery of hers.
clues.journalSummary: [Red] saw [Yellow] walking near [Location]'s entrance that night.

clues.name: RedYellowUnknown
clues.content: [Yellow]?  Why should I know? | She's the baker, she was probably at the bakery.
clues.journalSummary: [Red] didn't see [Yellow] that night.

clues.name: RedYellowInnocent
clues.content: I didn't see her leave the graveyard all night. | ...not that I was following her or anything.  I just happened to be nearby.
clues.journalSummary: [Red] saw [Yellow] in the graveyard for most of the night.

clues.name: RedRedGuilty
clues.content: What?  You think I did it?  I couldn't have done it, I was painting outside, nowhere near [Location], to keep from staining my floor.
clues.journalSummary: [Red] says she was painting away from [Location] that night.

clues.name: RedRedUnknown
clues.content: What?  You think I did it?  I couldn't have done it, I was painting outside, nowhere near [Location], to keep from staining my floor.
clues.journalSummary: [Red] says she was painting away from [Location] that night.

clues.name: RedRedInnocent
clues.content: What?  You think I did it?  I couldn't have done it, I was painting outside, nowhere near [Location], to keep from staining my floor.
clues.journalSummary: [Red] says she was painting away from [Location] that night.

clues.name: RedBlackGuilty
clues.content: Usually he heads into church by sunset, but he went out instead that night. | If I didn't see him on the road near [Location] later, then I might not have thought anything of it.
clues.journalSummary: [Red] saw [Black] on the road near [Location] that night.

clues.name: RedBlackUnknown
clues.content: [Black]?  I dunno.  Should I have seen him that night?
clues.journalSummary: [Red] didn't see [Black] that night.

clues.name: RedBlackInnocent
clues.content: I saw him head into church that night.  He must have been doing a devotional that night since he didn't come back out from what I saw.
clues.journalSummary: [Red] saw [Black] enter and not leave the church that night.

clues.name: RedBlueGuilty
clues.content: I saw [Blue] walking in the direction of [Location] at some point.  He was so drunk that it'd be a wonder if he made it there though.
clues.journalSummary: [Red] saw [Blue], drunk, headed in the direction of [Location].

clues.name: RedBlueUnknown
clues.content: I didn't see him, though I'd bet he was getting drunk somewhere. | When's that idiot going to shape up?
clues.journalSummary: [Red] didn't see [Blue] that night.

clues.name: RedBlueInnocent
clues.content: I saw him passed out on a bench that night.  I probably should have helped him, but... well, inspiration struck.
clues.journalSummary: [Red] saw [Blue] passed out on a bench that night.

clues.name: BlackGreenGuilty
clues.content: Before I went into the Lord's house for the night, I saw [Green] stalking around near [Location].  I went inside before I saw which direction he went. | He seems to defy the clock while working, doesn't he?
clues.journalSummary: [Black] saw [Green] walking around near [Location] that night.

clues.name: BlackGreenUnknown
clues.content: I didn't see him that night.  Mayhaps he was squirrled away in his winery?
clues.journalSummary: [Black] didn't see [Green] that night.

clues.name: BlackGreenInnocent
clues.content: I did see [Green] in [Location] during my break, but he left for his winery far before the murder occurred.
clues.journalSummary: [Black] saw [Green] head to his winery before the murder occurred.

clues.name: BlackYellowGuilty
clues.content: All the lights were off at her bakery that night, and she only shuts off the lights in her store when she leaves it. | Now that I think about it, I actually saw her walking away from [Location] during a break from my devotional.
clues.journalSummary: [Black] saw [Yellow] walking away from [Location] that night.

clues.name: BlackYellowUnknown
clues.content: All the lights were off at her bakery that night, and she only shuts off the lights in her store when she leaves it. | Even so, I hadn't spotted her all night.  How peculiar.
clues.journalSummary: [Black] didn't see [Yellow] that night.

clues.name: BlackYellowInnocent
clues.content: I saw her in the graveyard during a break from my devotional. | I know her husband is with the Lord, but I fear that she may not be joining him.  Perhaps she was coming to terms with that.
clues.journalSummary: [Black] saw [Yellow] in the graveyard that night.

clues.name: BlackRedGuilty
clues.content: I took a break from my devotion and saw [Red] skulking near the entrance to [Location].  How strange.
clues.journalSummary: [Black] saw [Red] near the entrance to [Location].

clues.name: BlackRedUnknown
clues.content: I had hoped to speak with [Red] before I went into my devotion, but she was nowhere to be found. | She must have been out for the night, but I could not imagine where.
clues.journalSummary: [Black] didn't see [Red] that night.

clues.name: BlackRedInnocent
clues.content: I took a brief walk that night and and saw her working late away from [Location] instead of joining the party. | Hopefully she was divining the Lord's work onto canvas.
clues.journalSummary: [Black] saw [Red] painting away from [Location] late that night.

clues.name: BlackBlackGuilty
clues.content: As a servent of the Lord, I must continually reconnect with Him. | I dedicated that night to this aim by committing myself to deep prayer in the church all night.
clues.journalSummary: [Black] says he stayed in the church all that night.

clues.name: BlackBlackUnknown
clues.content: As a servent of the Lord, I must continually reconnect with Him. | I dedicated that night to this aim by committing myself to deep prayer in the church all night.
clues.journalSummary: [Black] says he stayed in the church all that night.

clues.name: BlackBlackInnocent
clues.content: As a servent of the Lord, I must continually reconnect with Him. | I dedicated that night to this aim by committing myself to deep prayer in the church all night.
clues.journalSummary: [Black] says he stayed in the church all that night.

clues.name: BlackBlueGuilty
clues.content: Yes, [Blue] usually patrols [Location] each night.  Though I don't believe I saw him in [Location], just near the entrance of it that night.
clues.journalSummary: [Black] saw [Blue] near an entrance to [Location] that night.

clues.name: BlackBlueUnknown
clues.content: [Blue]?  I don't believe I could place him. | Perhaps he was slacking, as he is known to do.
clues.journalSummary: [Black] didn't see [Blue] that night.

clues.name: BlackBlueInnocent
clues.content: A man in his position should know to be more cautious with where he sleeps.  He was passed out.
clues.journalSummary: [Black] saw [Blue] passed out that night.

clues.name: BlueGreenGuilty
clues.content: %(Sigh)% I guess I saw [Green] walking near [Location], but that doesn't mean he's guilty. | %it's a public place afterall.%
clues.journalSummary: [Blue] saw [Green] near [Location] that night.

clues.name: BlueGreenUnknown
clues.content: I'm not his keeper, but I might have seen [Green] around. | %...was that who I saw?%
clues.journalSummary: [Blue] can't place [Green] that night.

clues.name: BlueGreenInnocent
clues.content: Who can keep track with all that he does? | But, most assuredly he was %hiccup% near the bakery.
clues.journalSummary: [Blue] saw [Green] at Yellow Bakery that night.

clues.name: BlueYellowGuilty
clues.content: [Yellow]?  I wouldn't dare miss her.  She definitely was headed in the direction of [Location] that night. | %too bad I couldn't walk straight or I'd have followed her.%
clues.journalSummary: [Blue] saw [Yellow] heading in the direction of [Location] that night.

clues.name: BlueYellowUnknown
clues.content: I didn't spot her that night.  And believe me, I tried. | ([Blue] shoots you a strange wink)
clues.journalSummary: [Blue] didn't see [Yellow] that night.

clues.name: BlueYellowInnocent
clues.content: %(sigh)% She was near the graveyard. | %I'd help her move on if she would let me.%
clues.journalSummary: [Blue] saw [Yellow] near the graveyard that night.

clues.name: BlueRedGuilty
clues.content: I was finishing up my last patrol when I saw her walking toward [Location]. | %she was probably just walking home though.%
clues.journalSummary: [Blue] saw [Red] walking toward [Location] that night.

clues.name: BlueRedUnknown
clues.content: Where was [Red], you ask? | ...Hm... %she didn't bug me that evening like usual.% | I, uh, don't know where she went.
clues.journalSummary: [Blue] didn't see [Red] that night.

clues.name: BlueRedInnocent
clues.content: She was making art in some alley. | Yeah... had to be her.  Who else here makes art?
clues.journalSummary: [Blue] thinks he saw [Red] doing art in an alley that night.

clues.name: BlueBlackGuilty
clues.content: [Black]?  He was out that night, sure.  I think he was near [Location] when I saw him. | ...Why?  Did he say something else?
clues.journalSummary: [Blue] saw [Black] out near [Location] that night.

clues.name: BlueBlackUnknown
clues.content: I'm pretty sure he was where he normally was, in the church. | I guess I didn't see him, but is he's never really anywhere else.
clues.journalSummary: [Blue] didn't see [Black] that night.

clues.name: BlueBlackInnocent
clues.content: Oh yeah, [Black] was having a devotional that night. | I saw him myself at the altar on my last round.
clues.journalSummary: [Blue] saw [Black] at the altar of the church that night.

clues.name: BlueBlueGuilty
clues.content: I was.... I was passed out that night.  The bottle hit me harder than usual.
clues.journalSummary: [Blue] says that he was passed out drunk that night.

clues.name: BlueBlueUnknown
clues.content: I was.... I was passed out that night.  The bottle hit me harder than usual.
clues.journalSummary: [Blue] says that he was passed out drunk that night.

clues.name: BlueBlueInnocent
clues.content: I was.... I was passed out that night.  The bottle hit me harder than usual.
clues.journalSummary: [Blue] says that he was passed out drunk that night.
